column4: hello guys Im runnning Ubuntu 10.4.2 LTS, for how long will updates be available for this version?
and when will I have to upgrade?
There's no such Ubuntu version as 10.4.2, do you mean 10.04.2?
Here with my distro I always have the latest release just by installing all package upgrades :D
so you run the LTS version but upgrades those packages which you like to the latest?
It's offtopic, so /msg me if you want to know more
Consider running this: sudo apt-get remove evolution*
Suppose so, btw Thunderbird rulz xD
To see all files from the thunderbird package, run: dpkg-query -L thunderbird
